meanings.sent1: The principal expels students who break the rules.
meanings.sent2: The bouncer expels troublemakers from the club.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand expels rabbits instead of flowers!
meanings.sent4: The strong wind expels leaves from the trees in autumn.
meanings.sent5: The superhero expels villains from the city to keep it safe.

meanings.definition: Eject or discharge (waste matter) from a body.
meanings.sent1: The body expels toxins through sweating.
meanings.sent2: The digestive system expels waste through bowel movements.
meanings.sent3: The garbage can expels a foul smell when not emptied regularly.
meanings.sent4: The volcano expels lava and ash during an eruption.
meanings.sent5: The sneeze expels germs into the air, so cover your mouth!
